articles.title: EU Space Agency's next shot: Pow, right to the Moon! - New Europe
articles.description: After working with NASA on designing a human habitation on Mars as part of the 3D Printed Habitat Challenge, international design practice Hassell will now be working closely with the European Space Agency (ESA) on two projects to design a master plan for a p…
